nodes.body: ‘khor lo, ‘khrul ‘khor, srung ‘khor [TBRC T1408], srog ‘khor (footnote: Dung dkar tshig mdzod: “The custom of writing the cirle of the mantra of the protector deity that one propitiates on cloth or paper, recognizing it to be the actual deity, and wearing it without ever being separated from it.”), bsrung ba, ‘dzul chog. Ex: Srung ‘khor rgya rtsa pa (W28420) = Bsrung ba’i ‘khor lo brgya rtsa brgyad pa (W23798)? Rdo rje nag po chen po gur gyi mgon po khro bo bcu dang bcas pa'i srung ba'i 'khor lo 'bri tshul rab gnas dang bcas pa'i cho ga rnam gsal rin chen sgron ma (W28210), Sam pu Ta la brten nas skyes bu chen po'i srung ba bri thabs (W1800), Gdugs dkar gyi bsrung ba 'bri tshul dang rab gnas bya tshul bcas (W11015), Thog bsrung gi ‘khor lo (W1882), Gur drag nyes sel srung ba dang ‘dzul chog (In Rin chen gter mdzod. See TBRC T2600]
